title: The prologue and epilogue to the History of Bacon in Virginia. Written by Mr. Dryden
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleetstreet,
notes: The prologue and epilogue to: Ben, Aphra.  The widdow ranter or, The history of Bacon in Virginia.
